name: วีรบุรุษไร้พลัง ไข่ต้ม
summary: A Turn-based RPG adventure game. Players will take on the role of a 'hero' who has been summoned to another world. The only goal of the 'king' who summoned him is to help eliminate the dangers in the dungeon. The hero must overcome various obstacles, explore dangerous areas, gain experience, and find rare items in order to defeat the 'demon king'.
